Description: Sherd of North Ionian Late Wild Goat style thick-walled pottery plate; white slip. Interior: between bands with added red bands lined in white an animal frieze: middle part of wild goat in black-figure preserved, filling ornaments (rosettes) in reserved technique; to the outside part of outer frieze with perhaps square filled with rosette. Exterior: to centre, rays with blob rosettes between; bands to outside.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.678)
